title: Tracxn
description: Tracxn is one of the leading data platforms that scans data to help customers perform market research on the startup ecosystem, find deals matching their mandate, perform company due diligence, In-depth tracking of funding rounds, company news, and tracking of emerging themes across industries & markets.Tracxn's clientele includes VC,PE,M&A,and Investment Banks. Tracxn platform is also used by Governments, A&I, and Universities for tracking  innovative companies and sectors.
